parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the wind direction smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero means there will be an immediate change.  <br>
'''NOTE''': Effect is global only when executed on the server. On clients wind direction will sync to server value in a while.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''setWindDir''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - Azimuth.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>60 '''setWindDir''' 180</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[windDir]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Execute on server
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 12, 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Seems to make wind [0,0] in MP. (Arma 3 1.00)
<BR><BR>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
